text:
This is an issue with the personalization token in the email templates.
The company name personalization token in templates does not work properly (but the contact first name token works fine). The templates leave the company name blank every time.
There are no errors or notifications. It pulls up the templated email with the correct contact name, and the company name blank (I have it 2 places, once in the subject line and once in the body. Both are blank)
Here is an example template, and the email it generates:
